description: Learn how to make delicious seafood and tomato rice with this easy recipe. Four ingredients is all you need to make this no-fuss meal in under 30 minutes.
keywords: Mains,Quick & easy dinner,Low saturated fat,High protein,Rice,Tomato,Low sugar,Dinner Made Easy,Low fat
name: Simple Seafood & Tomato Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups SunRice medium-grain white calrose rice

recipeInstructions.text: Bring stock to the boil in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat.

Meanwhile, heat 2 tbs extra virgin olive oil in a deep, 24cm (base) frying pan over medium-high heat. Add rice and two-thirds of the tomato, then cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until tomato has softened slightly and rice is coated.
Add stock and stir to combine. Bring to the boil, then reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, uncovered, without stirring, for 10 minutes.
Place marinara mix on rice and cook, covered, for 5 minutes or until rice is tender, seafood is cooked and liquid is almost absorbed. Season and serve scattered with remaining tomato.
